content.settings:
{
  "python.autoComplete.extraPaths": [
    "${workspaceFolder}/__pypackages__/3.12/lib"
  ],
  "python.analysis.extraPaths": [
    "${workspaceFolder}/__pypackages__/3.12/lib",
    "./src/core"
  ],
  "python.testing.autoTestDiscoverOnSaveEnabled": true,
  "python.analysis.autoImportCompletions": true,
  "python.analysis.indexing": true,
  "python.analysis.packageIndexDepths": [
    {
      "name": "django",
      "includeAllSymbols": true,
      "depth": 10
    },
    {
      "name": "rest_framework",
      "includeAllSymbols": true,
      "depth": 10
    },
    {
      "name": "core",
      "includeAllSymbols": true,
      "depth": 10
    }
  ],
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.black-formatter",
  "editor.formatOnSave": false,
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.organizeImports": "always"
  },
  "isort.args": ["--profile", "black"],
  "peacock.remoteColor": "#25415d",
  "python.testing.unittestEnabled": false,
  "python.testing.pytestEnabled": true,
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "activityBar.activeBorder": "#441b30",
    "activityBar.activeBackground": "#345a81",
    "activityBar.background": "#345a81",
    "activityBar.foreground": "#e7e7e7",
    "activityBar.inactiveForeground": "#e7e7e799",
    "activityBarBadge.background": "#441b30",
    "activityBarBadge.foreground": "#e7e7e7",
    "commandCenter.border": "#e7e7e799",
    "sash.hoverBorder": "#345a81",
    "statusBar.background": "#25415d",
    "statusBar.foreground": "#e7e7e7",
    "statusBarItem.hoverBackground": "#345a81",
    "statusBarItem.remoteBackground": "#25415d",
    "statusBarItem.remoteForeground": "#e7e7e7",
    "titleBar.activeBackground": "#25415d",
    "titleBar.activeForeground": "#e7e7e7",
    "titleBar.inactiveBackground": "#25415d99",
    "titleBar.inactiveForeground": "#e7e7e799"
  },
  "python.testing.pytestArgs": ["src"]
}
